title: Reincarnated as the Mastermind of the Story (LN) - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in a Game World   Romantic Subplot
author: Yuuki Ryou   結城涼
description:
『The Legend of the Seven Heroes』── A game that boasted of its worldwide popularity.

Ren, a university student who cleared its sequel while setting a world record, got reincarnated as a baby inside that game.

(Could it be that I reincarnated as the protagonist of 『The Legend of the Seven Heroes』?)

While indulging in such a thought, hearing his name from his mother’s mouth made him doubt his ears.

It was because that name was of a classmate of the heroes who later betrays them halfway into the story and also turns out to be the mysterious and powerful enemy who maneuvered behind the scenes to try and plunge the world into the depths of despair.

Wishing to live in peace, Ren decided to continue with his life in a remote region.

However, he ends up getting acquainted with the saintess whose life was supposed to be taken by him in the game, and is led to an unexpected and unfortunate destiny.

It’s the start of a fantasy story filled with dramatic developments and heart-pounding adventures that are impossible to take your eyes off……!>
